event.event-label: Business Service Monitoring: Service Operational Status Changed
event.descr: The operational status for business service '%parm[businessServiceName]%', with id=%parm[businessServiceId]%, changed from %parm[prevSeverityLabel]% to %parm[newSeverityLabel]%. args(%parm[##]%): %parm[all]%
event.logmsg: The operational status for business service '%parm[businessServiceName]%' changed from %parm[prevSeverityLabel]% to %parm[newSeverityLabel]%.

event.descr: There are currently one or more problems affecting business service '%parm[businessServiceName]%'. Root cause: %parm[rootCause]%. args(%parm[##]%): %parm[all]%
event.logmsg: One or more problems are affecting business service '%parm[businessServiceName]%'.

event.event-label: Business Service Monitoring: Service Problem Resolved
event.descr: The problem affecting business service '%parm[businessServiceName]%' has been resolved. args(%parm[##]%): %parm[all]%
event.logmsg: The problems affecting business service '%parm[businessServiceName]%' have been resolved.

event.descr: Business Service '%parm[businessServiceName]%' with ID '%parm[businessServiceId]%' is affected by the deletion of %parm[cause]%. A reload of the BSM daemon is scheduled. Make sure the Business Service still works properly. Please verify it's definition.
event.logmsg: Business service '%parm[businessServiceName]%' with ID '%parm[businessServiceId]%' is affected by the deletion of %parm[cause]%.

event.descr: The business service '%parm[businessServiceName]%' has been deleted. args(%parm[##]%): %parm[all]%
event.logmsg: The business service '%parm[businessServiceName]%' has been deleted.
